title: I Hate Luv Storys
short_cast: Imran Khan, Sonam Kapoor, Sammir Dattani, Samir Soni, Kavin Dave, Bruna Abdullah

desc: This Bollywood spoof recounts the ups and downs of an assistant film director who loathes romance and a designer who adores all things sentimental.
